data.message: Bidirectional search with semantic awareness beats blind BFS for knowledge path discovery. Two parallel agents (Team A: Music→Africa via Jazz/Blues, Team B: Africa→Music via Afrobeat) found paths in ~5 seconds with sources, while the API's BFS explored 243 topics over 15.5 seconds and failed. Key insight: starting from both ends and using semantically relevant bridges (like Fela Kuti, Afrobeat) is far more effective than random graph traversal.
